item.title: 【Cinema Center】MOVIE - The.Creator.2023.1080p.HULU.WEB-DL.DDP5.1.H.264-Samuel
item.description:
The Creator

Alternate Artwork 1 | Alternate Artwork 2 | Alternate Artwork 3 | Poster 1 | Poster 2 | Thumbnail | Key Art

Starring: John David Washington, Madeleine Yuna Voyles, Gemma Chan • Director: Gareth Edwards
Science Fiction, Action, Adventure • Movie • 2023
5.1 • HD

Description
As a future war between the human race and artificial intelligence rages on, ex-special forces agent Joshua is recruited to hunt down and kill the Creator, the elusive architect of advanced AI. The Creator has developed a mysterious weapon that has the power to end the war and all of mankind. As Joshua and his team of elite operatives venture into enemy-occupied territory, they soon discover the world-ending weapon is actually an AI in the form of a young child.

item.author: Samuel

item.title: 【Helpdesk】Mediafire Download Issue
item.description:
Hi,

Do many of you use Mediafire here?
I ask because lately I have been having issues with downloading albums from there. The download starts off okay, but stops when it gets to the end and automatically restarts (like a loop). The download eventually fails after a few loops.

I'll leave a random link (below). Can anyone try it and see if it works for them?
https://www.mediafire.com/file/sdtq...Reference+80+(FLAC)+-+UP+BY+MAGIC+JUAN+DJ.rar

If anyone tries this link, can they also leave a reply here and let me know how the download goes and if they experience the same issue?

Thanks a lot.
item.author: OrangeGround35
